keywords.indexterm: Protocol handlers could not be installed error

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: You receive an error saying that "Protocol handlers could not be installed".

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: This is a possible error when using the WAR distribution of because the WAR must be put in Tomcat and run with Java 17.

steps-informal.p: Add the following arguments to the JVM that runs Web Author:--add-opens=java.base/java.lang=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens=java.base/java.net=ALL-UNNAMED
To do so, follow the procedure below for the type of installer you used.

cause.title: Windows Installer
cause.p:
To add the above arguments in (in the Solution section), follow these steps:
Go to the installation directory of .
Launch Manage Web Author.
Go to the Java tab.
In the Maximum memory pool option, enter the arguments above.
Restart the application.

cause.title: Linux Installer or All Platforms Kit
cause.p:
To add the above arguments in (in the Solution section), follow these steps:
Go to the installation directory of .
Edit the oXygenXmlWebAuthor.vmoptions file.
Add the arguments presented in the Solution section.
Restart the application.
